p.d: A women is found hanged in her garden. There is no doubt that she has been murdered and the investigation reveals that the victim was strangled elsewhere before her body was placed in the garden. Léa and Paul take a particular interest in the young woman's professional environment... Directed by: Emmanuel Rigaut (season 2, France, 2017) Screenplay: Anthony Maugendre, Laurent Vachaud Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Renaud Leymans (Éric Vernet), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), Yvonnick Muller (David Vicaire), Patrick Descamps (Claude Mathieu), Amandine Longeac (Flore Mathieu) Genre: detective
